A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the most disappointing Star Wars ever and I've been a life-long fan of the Star Wars saga (comics\, books\, etc included).  Serious lack of answers and character development for pivotal characters and too much character development for minor/trivial characters who have boring/flat origins & motivations.  The number of plot holes evident in a single viewing are staggering as are the number of simply abandoned plot threads from The Force Awakens.  Were there good scenes?  Absolutely\, but not enough to redeem this dumpster fire of a Star Wars movie...
